title: Keir Starmer – 2019 Speech in Harlow
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Keir Starmer, the Shadow Brexit Secretary, in Harlow on 5 November 2019.
content:
Thank you Laura, and thanks to all of you for being here today.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
